PageTitle: display mpls te gmpls tunnel c-hop
FuncDef: The display mpls te gmpls tunnel c-hop command displays information about the path calculated for a GMPLS UNI tunnel.
CLIs: display mpls te gmpls tunnel c-hop [ tunnel-name <name> ] [ lsp-id <ingress-lsr-id> <egress-lsr-id> <session-id> <local-lsp-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about a path calculated for a GMPLS UNI tunnel with a specified name.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Displays information about a path calculated for a GMPLS UNI tunnel with a specified name.
-

Specifies the LSR ID of the ingress from which a GMPLS UNI tunnel originates.
-

Specifies the LSR ID of the egress from which a GMPLS UNI tunnel originates.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te gmpls tunnel c-hop
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about the path calculated for a GMPLS UNI tunnel, run the display mpls te gmpls tunnel c-hop command.
